property.name: Analysis status: Are you working on this family?

property.content:
{{include reference="PhenoTips.PatientSheetMacros" /}} {{include reference="PhenoTips.FormMacros" /}} {{velocity}} $xwiki.jsx.use('PhenoTips.FamilyRecordField_status') $xwiki.ssx.use('PhenoTips.FamilyRecordField_status') #set ($origObj = $familyMetaObj) #set ($familyMetaObj = $doc.getObject('PhenoTips.FamilyMetaClass')) #if (!$familyMetaObj) #set ($familyMetaObj = $doc.getObject('PhenoTips.FamilyMetaClass', true)) #set ($discard = $doc.save('Added mandatory PhenoTips.FamilyMetaClass object', true)) #end #set ($discard = $doc.use($familyMetaObj)) #set ($origClass = $familyMetaClass) #set ($familyMetaClass = $xwiki.getClass('PhenoTips.FamilyMetaClass')) #set ($for = "for='$!{familyMetaClass.name}_$!{familyMetaObj.number}_users'") #set ($activeUser = '') #if ($familyMetaObj.getProperty('users').getValue().contains($xcontext.getUser())) #set ($activeUser = 'userActiveOnFamily') #end #if ($familyMetaObj.getProperty('users').value == '' || !$familyMetaObj.getProperty('users').value) #set ($headerDisplay = 'none') #else #set ($headerDisplay = 'block') #end #if ($xcontext.action == 'edit' || $familyMetaObj.getProperty('analysis_status').value) (% class="fieldset analysis_status ${activeUser}" %)((( #if ($xcontext.action == 'edit') {{html clean="false" wiki="false"}}
$xwiki.getUserName($xcontext.getUser())
{{/html}} $doc.display('analysis_status', $xcontext.action, $familyMetaObj) $familyMetaObj.xWikiClass.get('analysis_status').getTranslatedPrettyName() #else {{html clean="false" wiki="false"}}$familyMetaObj.xWikiClass.get('analysis_status').getTranslatedPrettyName()$doc.display('analysis_status', $familyMetaObj){{/html}} #end ))) (% class="fieldset users" %)((( #if ($xcontext.action == 'edit') {{html clean="false" wiki="false"}}{{/html}}$doc.display('users', $xcontext.action, $familyMetaObj) #else #if ($familyMetaObj.getProperty('users').value == '' || !$familyMetaObj.getProperty('users').value) {{html clean="false" wiki="false"}}$familyMetaObj.xWikiClass.get('users').getTranslatedPrettyName()none{{/html}} #else {{html clean="false" wiki="true"}}$familyMetaObj.xWikiClass.get('users').getTranslatedPrettyName()
$doc.display('users', $familyMetaObj)
{{/html}} #end #end ))) #end #set ($familyMetaClass = $origClass) #set ($discard = $doc.use($origObj)) #set ($obj = $origObj) {{/velocity}}
